root.name: Naruto: Powerful Shippuden
root.description: NARUTO SD: Powerful Shippuuden JPN (Nov 2012)Naruto: Powerful Shippuden (NARUTO―ナルト―SD パワフル疾風伝, Naruto Esu Dī: Furupowā Shippuden) is a Nintendo 3DS game based on the Naruto anime spin-off, Naruto SD: Rock Lee no Seishun Full Power Ninden (NARUTO-ナルト- SD ロック・リーの青春フルパワー忍伝, Naruto Sugoi Doryoku: Rokku Rī no Seishun Furupowā Ninden). The game was first released in Japan in November 29, 2012, and the game was further released in North America in March 5, 2013.
